item.title: Mastering EJS: The Ultimate Guide to JavaScript Templating Engine
item.description:
In frontend development or Node.js server-side rendering, templating engines are powerful tools for dynamic HTML generation.
Among them, EJS (Embedded JavaScript Templates) stands out. Letâ€™s explore its features, core syntax, and practical use cases!
